title: I want you to track down a last season designer dress so I can buy it for my wedding.
snippet:
I need someone to help me hunt down a specific designer dress to buy. It is last season and therefore no longer available, however, I don't mind buying it second hand or from old stock. I also don't mind buying it from abroad as long as it's through a reputable site.

This is the dress: https://www.net-a-porter.com/gb/en/product/609332/msgm/printed-crepe-maxi-dress 

I am tall/large and ideally want the largest size IT48 (which is uk 16, european 42), but I will also accept a smaller size IT44 or IT46 and get it adjusted with insert side panels. 

Here's a useful link to size tables: https://www.net-a-porter.com/intl/pssizechart.nap?productID=609332&tab=1

I have looked fairly extensively on sites including eBay, Yoox and Vestiaire Collective with no luck. Can you help me find my wedding dress?!
